c74object.name: vpow~
c74object.description:
vpow~ provides a CPU efficient version of pow~ using SIMD operations.
vpow~ raises the base value (set in the right inlet) to the power of the exponent (set in the left inlet). Either inlet can receive a signal, float or int.

objarg.name: base-value
objarg.description: Sets the base value. The default value is 0. If a signal is connected to the right inlet, the argument is ignored.

method.name: float
method.description:
In left inlet: Sets the exponent. If there is a signal connected to the left inlet, a number received in the left inlet is ignored.
In right inlet: Sets the base value. If there is a signal connected to the right inlet, a number received in the right inlet is ignored.

method.name: signal
method.description:
In left inlet: Sets the exponent.
In right inlet: Sets the base value.

entry.name: signal
entry.description: The base value (from the right inlet) raised to the exponent (from the left inlet).
